item.title: Hard Times, main themes and plot of the novel
item.description: Hard Times is a long novel set in the north of England, wrote by Charles Dickens. The fictitious name of the novel is Coke Town, Coke is a type of coal which was mined in the main setting, the industrial town. Hard Times is a Bildungsroman, a novel of formation. Ther are lots of plots sewed togheter in this novel, a main plot cohabiting with many subplots. It was published in 1894, in three books:
